titleStmt.title: Comments to 南華真經註疏

publicationStmt.ab: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org
publicationStmt.availability: This work is in the public domain

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project
Comments and notes to 南華真經註疏 for translation .

p.seg: See 王孝魚 emendations ZZJS 317
ZZJS 317 ends with 也

ZZJS 319 性 = 情
ZZJS 319 矜 = 務

ZZJS 321 賔 = 賓

ZZJS 321 reads 鼓 for 鼔.

NB: 成玄英 ZZJS 329 here uses 闇 but elsewhere (ZZJS 325) uses 暗. The TLS text uses 闇 in both cases.
ZZJS 329 reads 常唯一也, omitting 無 and adding 也

ZZJS reads 遨遊 for 敖游 (NB: Perhaps too trivial to note. But I am as of yet undecided, so I err on the side of including this. Mainly because I am more familiar with 遨 than 敖.)
ZZJS 330 reads 祇 for 秪. See 陸德明 ZZJS 330: "祇足" 音支
See 陸德明 ZZJS 330: "使喪"息浪反。下已喪同。
ZZJS 331 reads 徇 for 殉
陸德明 ZZJS 331: "以撓"而小反，郭呼堯反，又許羔反。廣雅云：亂也。又奴爪反。
ZZJS 331 reads 朴 for 樸 (NB: pu3 (but *not* po4, piao2, and po1) 朴 is interchangeable with 樸)

See ZZJS 393: 慶藩案無測，言無盡也。說文：測，深所至也。深所至，謂深之盡極處。呂氏春秋論人篇闊大淵深，不可測也，高注：測，盡極也。淮南原道篇水大不可極，深不可測，高注：測，盡也。無測有極，正對文言之。
